name: The Rock Sorcerer
description:
Play in Fullscreen for best experience

Use WASD: to move the wizard (You can also use spacebar for Jump)

Use arrows to move a special rock

Game Prototype By: Suraj Sirohi, Aaron Munavish-Hogart,  Abdullah Allami, Alex Durocher,  Amelia McLeavey, Edward (Yuhao) Lu

We are hoping to continue working on this prototype and adding more levels in the future
